content.text: What's your favorite way to spend your time off?
I enjoy taking my dogs to the park to run around.
What kind of dogs do you have?
I have two chihuahuas. They're a lot of work, but they're also a lot of fun.
I love dogs! I have a golden retriever. He's my best friend.
That's great! I've always wanted a golden retriever.
They're the best dogs. They're so friendly and loving.
I'm sure mine would love to meet yours.
We should set up a playdate!
Great! I'll let you know when my schedule is clear.
Have you always been a dog person?
Yeah, I've always loved dogs. I grew up with a golden retriever, too.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have such a good experience with dogs.
Me too! They're the best companions a person could ask for.
I know, right? They're always there for you
